personal.name: Manoel Gustavo
personal.title: Full Stack developer
personal.tagline: As a Computer Science graduate and full stack developer, I have experience across the entire software development cycle. I am proactive, responsible, agile and communicative. My main focus is to deliver and add value to the product, regardless of technological preferences.

home.description: As a Computer Science graduate and full stack developer, I have experience across the entire software development cycle. I am proactive, responsible, agile and communicative. My main focus is to deliver and add value to the product, regardless of technological preferences.

experience.description: A timeline of my professional and educational journey.

timeline.title: Back End Developer
timeline.description: I develop solutions for the Liqi Crypto platform, which provides Crypto as a Service infrastructure for companies, including Ita√∫, one of the largest banks in Latin America. I develop scalable and secure solutions for critical operational routes with high volume requests, performed integrations with exchanges and third-party services, and optimized architecture reducing cloud costs by more than 10x.

timeline.title: Full Stack Developer
timeline.description: Led the development of web platforms with focus on performance and UX. Implemented crucial requirements in the API for the platform's payment system, integrating queues, background jobs, event triggers. Implemented +200 unit tests and supervised interns and junior developers.

timeline.title: Mobile/Frontend Developer
timeline.description: I developed and maintained web platforms for the Bounty Card project from inception to successful launch. Implemented +50 automated tests, refactored screens with huge tables to improve performance by up to 10x, and developed screens for applications with focus on UX and performance.

timeline.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
timeline.description: Studied computer science fundamentals and software engineering principles. Gained comprehensive knowledge in algorithms, object-oriented programming, and modern web technologies.

projects.description: A collection of my most recent and notable work, each representing a unique challenge and solution.

items.title: LoopPedalOnline
items.description: Online loop pedal with face recognition control - an innovative music application that combines audio processing with computer vision technology.

items.title: QuizSphere
items.description: Social networking app for quizzes - a platform that combines social interaction with educational content through interactive quizzes.

items.title: ClipMaker
items.description: Online Clip Generator - a web-based tool for creating and editing video clips with an intuitive interface.

items.title: RecomendaFilmes
items.description: Website for movies and series recommendations - a platform that helps users discover new content based on their preferences.

items.title: SistemaPetshop
items.description: Fictional pet shop management system - a comprehensive solution for managing pet shop operations including inventory, appointments, and customer management.

items.title: Ecoleta
items.description: System to find nearby recycling points - a Rocketseat marathon project focused on environmental sustainability and waste management.
